content: परित्यागः {@--1@} Leaving, quitting, abandonment, desertion, repudiation (as of a wife &c.); अपरित्यागमयाचतात्मनः <ls>R. 8. 12</ls>; कृतसीतापरित्यागः <ls n="R.">15. 1</ls>. {@--2@} Giving up, renouncing, discarding, renunciation, abdication &c.; स्वनामपरित्यागं करोमि <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> ‘I shall forego my name’; <ls>Ms. 2. 95.</ls> {@--3@} Neglect, omission; मोहात्तस्य ( कर्मणः) परित्यागस्तामसः परिकीर्तितः <ls>Bg. 18. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Giving away, liberality. {@--5@} Loss, privation. {@--6@} A sacrifice. {@--7@} Separation from.
